unnormalised: Keep your PNR no. safe after booking train tickets; it can be used to check your reservation status. Also, you'll need your ticket no. to claim a refund if your train, such as the Rajdhani Exp, is cancelled.
normalised: Keep your P-N-R number safe after booking train tickets; it can be used to check your reservation status. Also, you'll need your ticket number to claim a refund if your train, such as the Rajdhani Express, is cancelled.
